---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Change ticket approver"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/workflow/approval/change"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Changes the approver assignment for a ticket that is currently in an approval workflow state. Use this to reassign approval responsibility to a different user or team.

**Behavior**
- Only works when ticket is in an approval-pending workflow state
- Can change individual user approver, team approver, or both
- Original approver is removed when new approver is assigned

**Use Cases**
- Reassigning approval when original approver is unavailable
- Escalating to a different approval authority
- Transferring approval responsibility between teams

**Prerequisites**
- Ticket must be in a workflow state awaiting approval
- Obtain user IDs via [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users)
- Obtain team IDs via team management endpoints

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/workflow/approval](/docs/api/tickets/send-ticket-for-approval) – Initial approval request
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/workflow/delete](/docs/api/tickets/delete-workflow-approval) – Cancel pending approval

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"UUID of the ticket with pending approval","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Approver change details","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for sending a ticket to an approval workflow or changing the approver assignment.","properties":{"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the ticket requiring approval. Should match the TicketId in the URL path.","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"},"ApproverUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Current approver user ID (when changing approvers).","nullable":true,"example":"c64a05b1-6a2d-ea11-a601-0003ffe41fe2","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/search","responseField":"Item.Users[].UserId"}},"NewApproverUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"New approver user ID to assign for this ticket.","nullable":true,"example":"2899c843-6030-ed11-ae83-14cb6572af81","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/search","responseField":"Item.Users[].UserId"}},"ApproverTeamId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Current approver team ID (when changing team approvers).","nullable":true,"example":"9d2d1481-3a23-4c1d-8f89-7c6e81cb4364"},"NewApproverTeamId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"New approver team ID to assign for this ticket.","nullable":true,"example":"e4b5c6d7-8e9f-0a1b-2c3d-4e5f6a7b8c9d"}},"example":{"TicketId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","NewApproverUserId":"2899c843-6030-ed11-ae83-14cb6572af81"},"title":"SendTicketForApprovalRequest"},"example":{"TicketId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","ApproverUserId":"c64a05b1-6a2d-ea11-a601-0003ffe41fe2","NewApproverUserId":"2899c843-6030-ed11-ae83-14cb6572af81"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
